H0.text: Both parents are the source from which a male puppy inherits traits.

H1.text: Its mother, only, is the source from which a male puppy inherits traits.

H2.text: Its father, only, is the source from which a male puppy inherits traits.

A3.text: When a pair of organisms reproduce sexually, their offspring randomly inherit one of the two alleles from each parent.

A4.text: The two alleles for a gene are located on identical loci of the two homologous chromosomes, each allele inherited from a different parent.
